name: Erode (EnergizedBlast)
description:
How far can you drill into the earth using your never-ending spout of water?

A Ludum Dare 48 jam entry. If the web version runs slow, I recommend downloading the game folder and play it that way.

  • All art and code was created by EnergizedBlast
  • Sound effects were made in SFXR (a program made back for Ludum Dare 10)
